text: commuters on New York subway might feel
like their journey to work is somewhat
like a rat race but passengers on one
underground train did not expect this
a large rat was spotted running around a
carriage traveling through downtown
Manhattan
the unexpected passenger caused chaos
forcing commuters to stand on their
seats and trying to flee its path
by the time the rodent was spotted the
train doors were already shut and
traveling for a tunnel despite pleas by
the train operator to stay calm most
couldn't control their distress one
passenger though decided to film it on
his mobile phone as soon as a train
reached the next station many passengers
disembarked and decided to continue
their journey on another train the final
destination of the rat is unknown
Katie Hastings BBC news
